verses.verse: תְּפִלָּ֗ה <WH8605> te-fil-Lah, A Prayer לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> le-Da-Vid of David הַטֵּֽה־ <WH5186> hat-teh- Bow down יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD אָזְנְךָ֣ <WH241> 'a-ze-ne-Cha thine ear עֲנֵ֑נִי <WH6030> 'a-Ne-ni; hear כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- For עָנִ֖י <WH6041> 'a-Ni me for I [am] poor וְאֶבְי֣וֹן <WH34> ve-'ev-Yon and needy אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> 'A-ni. I

שָֽׁמְרָ֣ה <WH8104> sha-me-Rah Preserve נַפְשִׁי֮ <WH5315> naf-Shi my soul כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- I am a חָסִ֪יד <WH2623> cha-Sid for I [am] holy אָ֥נִי <WH589> 'A-ni I הוֹשַׁ֣ע <WH3467> ho-Sha' save עַ֭בְדְּךָ <WH5650> 'Av-de-cha thy servant אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You אֱלֹהַ֑י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hai; O thou my God הַבּוֹטֵ֥חַ <WH982> hab-bo-Te-ach that trusteth אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha. about

חָנֵּ֥נִי <WH2603> chon-ne-ni Be merciful אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai; unto me O Lord כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for אֵלֶ֥יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha to אֶ֝קְרָ֗א <WH7121> 'ek-Ra, for I cry כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> hai-Yom. unto thee daily

שַׂ֭מֵּחַ <WH8055> me-ach Rejoice נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> Ne-fesh the soul עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> 'av-De-cha; of thy servant כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for אֵלֶ֥יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha to אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai, for unto thee O Lord נַפְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> naf-Shi my soul אֶשָּֽׂא׃ <WH5375> 'es-Sa. do I lift up

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You אֲ֭דֹנָי <WH136> 'A-do-nai For thou Lord ט֣וֹב <WH2896> Tov [art] good וְסַלָּ֑ח <WH5546> ve-sal-Lach; and ready to forgive וְרַב־ <WH7227> ve-rav- and plenteous חֶ֝֗סֶד <WH2617> Che-sed, in mercy לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol to all קֹרְאֶֽיךָ׃ <WH7121> ko-re-'Ei-cha. unto all them that call

הַאֲזִ֣ינָה <WH238> ha-'a-Zi-nah Give ear יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD תְּפִלָּתִ֑י <WH8605> te-fil-la-Ti; unto my prayer וְ֝הַקְשִׁ֗יבָה <WH7181> ve-hak-Shi-vah, and attend בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> be-Kol to the voice תַּחֲנוּנוֹתָֽי׃ <WH8469> ta-cha-nu-no-Tai. of my supplications

בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom In the day צָ֭רָתִ֥י <WH6869> tza-ra-Ti of my trouble אֶקְרָאֶ֗ךָּ <WH7121> 'ek-ra-'E-ka, I will call כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for תַעֲנֵֽנִי׃ <WH6030> ta-'a-Ne-ni. upon thee for thou wilt answer

אֵין־ <WH369> 'ein- There כָּמ֖וֹךָ <WH3644> ka-Mo-cha like בָאֱלֹהִ֥ים׀ <WH430> va-'E-lo-Him Among the gods אֲדֹנָ֗י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai, [there is] none like unto thee O Lord וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> ve-'Ein is no כְּֽמַעֲשֶֽׂיךָ׃ <WH4639> Ke-ma-'a-Sei-cha. neither [are there any works] like unto thy works

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All גּוֹיִ֤ם׀ <WH1471> go-Yim All nations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom עָשִׂ֗יתָ <WH6213> 'a-Si-ta, whom thou hast made יָב֤וֹאוּ׀ <WH935> ya-Vo-'u shall come וְיִשְׁתַּחֲו֣וּ <WH7812> ve-yish-ta-cha-Vu and worship לְפָנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> le-fa-Nei-cha before אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai; thee O Lord וִֽיכַבְּד֣וּ <WH3513> vi-chab-be-Du and shall glorify לִשְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <WH8034> lish-Me-cha. thy name

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for גָד֣וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol For thou [art] great אַ֭תָּה <WH859> 'At-tah you וְעֹשֵׂ֣ה <WH6213> ve-'o-Seh and doest נִפְלָא֑וֹת <WH6381> nif-la-'ot; wondrous things אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him thou [art] God לְבַדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH905> le-vad-De-cha. alone

ה֘וֹרֵ֤נִי <WH3384> ho-Re-ni Teach יְהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD דַּרְכֶּ֗ךָ <WH1870> dar-Ke-cha, me thy way אֲהַלֵּ֥ךְ <WH1980> 'a-hal-Lech I will walk בַּאֲמִתֶּ֑ךָ <WH571> ba-'a-mit-Te-cha; in thy truth יַחֵ֥ד <WH3161> ya-Ched unite לְ֝בָבִ֗י <WH3824> le-va-Vi, my heart לְיִרְאָ֥ה <WH3372> le-yir-'Ah to fear שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <WH8034> she-Me-cha. thy name

אוֹדְךָ֤׀ <WH3034> 'od-Cha I will praise אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai thee O Lord אֱ֭לֹהַי <WH430> 'E-lo-hai my God בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all לְבָבִ֑י <WH3824> le-va-Vi; with all my heart וַאֲכַבְּדָ֖ה <WH3513> va-'a-chab-be-Dah and I will glorify שִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> shim-Cha thy name לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> le-'o-Lam. for evermore

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- For חַ֭סְדְּךָ <WH2617> Chas-de-cha [is] thy mercy גָּד֣וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol For great עָלָ֑י <WH5921> 'a-Lai; toward וְהִצַּ֥לְתָּ <WH5337> ve-hitz-Tzal-ta toward me and thou hast delivered נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> naf-Shi, my soul מִשְּׁא֥וֹל <WH7585> mish-she-'ol hell תַּחְתִּיָּֽה׃ <WH8482> tach-ti-Yah. from the lowest

אֱלֹהִ֤ים׀ <WH430> E-lo-Him O God זֵ֘דִ֤ים <WH2086> ze-Dim the proud קָֽמוּ־ <WH6965> ka-mu- are risen עָלַ֗י <WH5921> 'a-Lai, against וַעֲדַ֣ת <WH5712> va-'a-Dat against me and the assemblies עָ֭רִיצִים <WH6184> 'A-ri-tzim of violent בִּקְשׁ֣וּ <WH1245> bik-Shu [men] have sought נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> naf-Shi; after my soul וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> ve-Lo have not שָׂמ֣וּךָ <WH7760> sa-Mu-cha and have not set לְנֶגְדָּֽם׃ <WH5048> le-neg-Dam. before

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah O אֲ֭דֹנָי <WH136> 'A-do-nai But thou O Lord אֵל־ <WH410> 'el- [art] a God רַח֣וּם <WH7349> ra-Chum full of compassion וְחַנּ֑וּן <WH2587> ve-chan-Nun; and gracious אֶ֥רֶךְ <WH750> 'E-rech Slow אַ֝פַּ֗יִם <WH639> 'ap-Pa-yim, to anger וְרַב־ <WH7227> ve-rav- and plenteous חֶ֥סֶד <WH2617> Che-sed in mercy וֶאֱמֶֽת׃ <WH571> ve-'e-Met. and truth

פְּנֵ֥ה <WH6437> pe-Neh O turn אֵלַ֗י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to me וְחָ֫נֵּ֥נִי <WH2603> ve-chon-Ne-ni unto me and have mercy תְּנָֽה־ <WH5414> te-nah- upon me give עֻזְּךָ֥ <WH5797> 'uz-ze-Cha thy strength לְעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> le-'av-De-cha; unto thy servant וְ֝הוֹשִׁ֗יעָה <WH3467> ve-ho-Shi-'ah, and save לְבֶן־ <WH1121> le-ven- the son אֲמָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH519> 'a-ma-Te-cha. of thine handmaid

עֲשֵֽׂה־ <WH6213> 'a-seh- Shew עִמִּ֥י <WH5973> 'im-Mi with א֗וֹת <WH226> ot, me a token לְט֫וֹבָ֥ה <WH2896> le-To-Vah for good וְיִרְא֣וּ <WH7200> ve-yir-'U me may see שֹׂנְאַ֣י <WH8130> so-ne-'Ai that they which hate וְיֵבֹ֑שׁוּ <WH954> ve-ye-Vo-shu; [it] and be ashamed כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- Because אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> 'at-Tah O יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh because thou LORD עֲזַרְתַּ֥נִי <WH5826> 'a-zar-Ta-ni hast holpen וְנִחַמְתָּֽנִי׃ <WH5162> ve-ni-cham-Ta-ni. me and comforted
